alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 08 at 7:40PM CST until February 11 at 1:00AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Poteau affecting Le Flore County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poteau River near Panama. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 37.0 feet, extensive flooding of crop and pasture lands occur between Shady Point and Arkoma. Many roads in the floodplain become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 30.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 37.0 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
